About

Hello, I'm Ruuben, I'm 22 years old and I'm a graduate student Devine.

When I started studying Devine, I already had some knowledge about Photoshop,
I liked to experiment with the software in my free time, and used it for the styling of some projects at elementary school. Studying digital design and development seemed like a logic step for me!

The past two years I have learned a lot about coding and designing.
Beside mastering web development & web design, I also learned about UI/UX, developing games in Phaser, and how to work with React.

Whenever I have spare time, I like to explore the city, go traveling, or have a good chat with friends while drinking a cup of coffee.
